text_block_list.text: Several days after the tryouts...

The siblings Biwa Hayahide and<n>Narita Brian find
themselves<n>surrounded by enthusiastic trainers.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text: I'm beggin' ya! Just gimme a minute<n>of your time!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Tch... What a pain. I told them I<n>haven't even raced in
tryouts yet.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Don't say that. You're receiving<n>scouting offers regardless.
That's<n>proof of their confidence in you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I still don't like it...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
No one beats my drive! I can lead you<n>straight to the Triple
Crown! Please,<n>Beast!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'd treat you the best! What do you<n>say, Brian? No one
would pay more<n>respect to your natural talent than me!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that goes for you too, Biwa<n>Hayahide! Let me train you!
A little<n>sibling rivalry to sharpen our training!<n>Sounds great,
doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm pleased at the offer, but I remain<n>undecided. I must
humbly decline.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Well then... I will be going on ahead,<n>Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Hey, if you're gonna leave,<n>take these scavengers
with you!

Biwa Hayahide departs with a smile<n>on her face. But under
that smirk, I<n>glimpse a hint of concern.
I decide to follow her out of curiosity.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Oh, it's you again. I believe I<n>saw you watching us
from a distance<n>earlier.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Did you follow me? Haha, seeing as<n>how you helped with
my glasses, I<n>suspect you mean no harm.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Please, Sis! Wait for me! Huff,huff...

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Come on, hurry up! We're<n>almost at the finish!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
...My cherished little sister. She may<n>appear aloof, but she is
actually an<n>earnest and good person.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes... As children we always amused<n>ourselves racing in
parks like this. She<n>was competitive and often wound up<n>
crying, since I was the faster one<n>then.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But... she said she loved racing and<n>had fun running with
me. She was<n>always following in my footsteps.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wish I could've always been a<n>sister she could look up to.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ever since then, our goal has<n>remained unchanged—to race
in the<n>Twinkle Series together.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We were always together... That's<n>why I could sense it. My
sister's...<n>Narita Brian's unique qualities began<n>to surface.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And then her physical abilities swiftly<n>grew to surpass mine.
Power, speed,<n>stamina... She has them all in spades.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Everyone knows she's a rare<n>phenomenon. In time, she'll
become a<n>"Beast" on par with President Symboli<n>Rudolf.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That's why I needed an edge. But<n>one that differs from
hers.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What I lack in physical prowess, I<n>make up for in precisely
planned<n>strategies. And when there is a limit<n>to training
time, I maximize efficiency.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I have constructed formulas based on<n>my theories, and I will
find the solution<n>to victory—using my "winning<n>equation!"

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Haha, it's still a work in progress. My<n>equation can't
contend with Brian yet.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Sniffle. No fair! I wanna run superfast like you...

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text: Don't cry! There, there. Here, I'll tell<n>you my secret!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: We made a promise.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
She may not even remember, but... it<n>doesn't matter. As her
older sister<n>and as an Umamusume, I must keep<n>my word.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We will stand together at the Twinkle<n>Series—and we will
have the greatest<n>race of our lives!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And with my perfected winningequation—I will claim victory!

The mysterious, ever calm, and<n>collected Biwa Hayahide
actually<n>hides an intensely burning desire<n>within.

And in her empirical running, I see<n>entirely new possibilities
for racing!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Huh? What did you say?
choice_data_list: I want to help write your winning equation!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: S-so you mean?! But... I'm still not<n>sure if I'm ready.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And more importantly... are you<n>certain?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ...That I'm the sibling you want?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I've written all the theories I'm<n>developing in this notebook.
Of course,<n>my winning equation is here as well.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But today it seems I must write about<n>an additional
important matter.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It concerns you, Trainer. I'll label this<n>section with your
name.
And so, I become Biwa Hayahide's<n>trainer.

Together, we vow to complete the<n>unbeatable winning
equation and<n>achieve her goal.
A few days pass since teaming up...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Hm, what is this? I hear more talk of<n>Brian than usual.)

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: So is it true?! That Brian's gonna race<n>in the Sprout Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, seems legit!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
(The Sprout Kinen... Even among<n>Junior runners, only the
most<n>esteemed racers can gain entry!)

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! Amazing! It's totally<n>unheard-of for a pre-debut<n>
Umamusume to be chosen!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Brian's on a completely different<n>level!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: So you've run even further ahead.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And that's why I will completemy winning equation!
